doc.title: Person-Oddity Series: Rural Rhapsody
doc.plot: This entry in Universal's "Person-Oddity" series of shorts (production number 1375)drops in on retired band leader Paul Whiteman at his 700-acre Walking Horse Farm in Rosemont, New Jersey. It then hops back across the country to see how old sourdough prospector George Carnes, of Mountain Rach, California, still gets sizable pokes of gold from his efforts.
